PRF_FallenDown.PedFlagsMeta.psc: decides whether to ik rotate body to match ground angle

PRF_DontRenderThisFrame.PedFlagsMeta.psc: force ped to stop rendering this frame (for example - drive task can stop peds rendering inside buses)

PRF_BlockMovementAnims.PedFlagsMeta.psc: completely disable processing of on-foot movement anim blending for this frame

PRF_ZeroDesiredMoveBlendRatios.PedFlagsMeta.psc: zero out all inputs to movement system this frame, causing ped to stop moving

PRF_DontChangeMbrInSimpleMoveDoNothing.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If this is set, then CTaskSimpleMoveDoNothing will not reset desired moveblendratio to zero this frame.

PRF_FollowingRoute.PedFlagsMeta.psc: whether this ped is following a route of some sort - used to let simplest goto task pull the ped back onto their current route segment

PRF_TakingRouteSplineCorner.PedFlagsMeta.psc: whether the ped is cornering via a spline curve, which will take them off their route linesegment

PRF_ProcessPhysicsTasks.PedFlagsMeta.psc: do we need to call process physics for (main) tasks this frame

PRF_ProcessPreRender2.PedFlagsMeta.psc: do we need to call ProcessPreRender2 for tasks

PRF_FiringWeapon.PedFlagsMeta.psc: set when ped fires any weapon, so script can check the flag

PRF_SearchingForCover.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set if the ped is likely to be searching for cover, used by the navmesh to load coverpoints around interested peds

PRF_KeepCoverPoint.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set if the ped wants to keep their current cover point this frame, otherwise it gets released

PRF_IsClimbing.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If the ped is climbing, shimmying or on a ladder.  Stops ProcessProbes() from happening.

PRF_IsLanding.PedFlagsMeta.psc: is landing after being in the air

PRF_CullExtraFarAway.PedFlagsMeta.psc: flag Ai can set to make ped get culled further away (used for roadblock cops, crimials...)

PRF_DoNotClampFootIk.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Stop clamping the foot IK. Maybe the clamps should be parameters of the IK manager, but apparently that is to be refactored in future

PRF_PatrollingInVehicle.PedFlagsMeta.psc: ped is patrolling in a vehicle, likely meaning they are swat or police

PRF_IsWalkingRoundPlayer.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Whether this ped is walking around another ped (one frame latency)

PRF_AmbientAnimsBlocked.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Blocks new ambient idles from starting.

PRF_ApplyVelocityDirectly.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Should we apply the velocity directly to the physics collider or go through the force solver?

PRF_ResetMoveGroupAfterRagdoll.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If true, will reset the temp anim group when not ragdolling

PRF_DisablePedConstraints.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Allow the ped to rotate around freely

PRF_DisablePlayerJumping.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Disables player jumping if true. Reset in ResetPostPhysics, as it will be set via script

PRF_DisablePlayerVaulting.commands_ped.sch: Disable climbing / vaulting (but not auto-vault, that's a seperate flag).

PRF_DisableAsleepImpulse.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Disable the code that pushes peds which fall asleep in the air

PRF_AllowUpdateIfNoCollisionLoaded.commands_ped.sch: Don't freeze this ped for not having bounds loaded around it

PRF_PlacingCharge.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Setting Bomb (firing weapon is set also)

PRF_ScriptDisableSecondaryAnimationTasks.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Disable upper body animtion tasks such as shove ped and open door anims

PRF_SupressGunfireEvents.commands_ped.sch: Supresses AI generating fire events, so civilians wont be shocked or react, for use in a shooting range for example

PRF_InfiniteStamina.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Currently just for mounts, but could be expanded to anything with stamina
PRF_InfiniteStamina.commands_ped.sch: Currently just for mounts, but could be expanded to anything with stamina

PRF_BlockWeaponReactionsUnlessDead.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Stops ragdoll and nm behaviors triggering from weapon damage unless the ped has died.
PRF_BlockWeaponReactionsUnlessDead.commands_ped.sch: Stops the ped from reacting to damage events (such as shots / fires, etc). The ped will still take damage while this flag is active. Note: this does not block explosion reactions.

PRF_ForcePlayerFiring.commands_ped.sch: Forces player to fire even if they aren't pressing fire

PRF_InCoverFacingLeft.PedFlagsMeta.psc: set when exiting the cover state saying if we are facing left

PRF_ForcePeekFromCover.PedFlagsMeta.psc: if set the ped will go into peeking if they are already in cover
PRF_ForcePeekFromCover.commands_ped.sch: Forces an actor that is in cover to continue (or start if they haven't yet) peeking

PRF_NotAllowedToChangeCrouchState.PedFlagsMeta.psc: if set the ped will not be allowed to change their crouch state

PRF_ForceMeleeStrafingAnims.PedFlagsMeta.psc: forces a ped to use the melee strafing anims when strafing

PRF_HitPedWithWeapon.PedFlagsMeta.psc: set when damage is inflicted by this ped on another ped

PRF_ForcePedToUseScripCamHeading.PedFlagsMeta.psc: forces a ped to the scripted camera heading instead of gameplay
PRF_ForcePedToUseScripCamHeading.commands_ped.sch: forces a ped to the scripted camera heading instead of gameplay

PRF_ProcessProbesWhenExtractingZ.PedFlagsMeta.psc: makes the capsule physics push the ped out of the ground even when extracting z

PRF_KeepDesiredCoverPoint.PedFlagsMeta.psc: should the ped keep their desired cover point this frame

PRF_HasProcessedCornering.PedFlagsMeta.psc: whether the ped has already processed slowing down for this corner

PRF_StandingOnForkliftForks.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set when the ped standing capsule hits the forklift forks.

PRF_AimWeaponReactionRunning.PedFlagsMeta.psc: ped is running the reaction task this frame

PRF_InContactWithFoliage.PedFlagsMeta.psc: ped is in contact with GTA_FOLIAGE_TYPE bounds

PRF_ForceExplosionCollisions.PedFlagsMeta.psc: ped will always collide with explosions, even when collision is off

PRF_IgnoreTargetsCoverForLOS.PedFlagsMeta.psc: when checking LOS against targets this ped will ignore their cover (if the cover exists)
PRF_IgnoreTargetsCoverForLOS.commands_ped.sch: When doing LOS checks to other peds we won't use the cover vantage position as the "target" position

PRF_BlockAnimatedWeaponReactions.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped should not play animated damager reactions while this flag is set

PRF_DisablePedCapsule.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Removes the ped capsule from the physics simulation

PRF_DisableCrouchWhileInCover.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Force the crouch flag to return true while in cover.
PRF_DisableCrouchWhileInCover.commands_ped.sch: Force the crouch flag to return true while in cover.

PRF_IncreasedAvoidanceRadius.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Adds extra 2m onto the radius other peds use to avoid this ped during local steering.

PRF_ForceRunningSpeedForFragSmashing.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Can be set by designers to force the ped to smash more easily through frags.
PRF_ForceRunningSpeedForFragSmashing.commands_ped.sch: Forces a ped to apply forces to frags as if running on contact, to guarantee peds will smash through frag objects when playing custom anims

PRF_EnableMoverAnimationWhileAttached.PedFlagsMeta.psc: While flagged, any mover animation will be applied to the offset of the attachment.

PRF_NoTimeDelayBeforeShot.PedFlagsMeta.psc: While flagged, The time delay before a player can fire after aiming is 0

PRF_SearchingForAutoVaultClimb.PedFlagsMeta.psc: inform climb code we are doing an autovault

PRF_ExtraLongWeaponRange.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Extends the range of a peds weapons to 250m
PRF_ExtraLongWeaponRange.commands_ped.sch: Force the bullets gun range to increase to 250m

PRF_ForcePlayerToEnterVehicleThroughDire.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Forces the player to only use direct access when entering vehicles
PRF_ForcePlayerToEnterVehicleThroughDire.commands_ped.sch: Forces the player to only use direct access when entering vehicles

PRF_TaskCullExtraFarAway.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Can be set by ai tasks on the main task tree to disable a ped getting cull from a vehicle.
PRF_TaskCullExtraFarAway.commands_ped.sch: Disable a ped getting cull from a vehicle from pretend occupants.

PRF_IsVaulting.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set the entire time CTaskVault is running.

PRF_IsParachuting.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set the entire time CTaskParachute is running.

PRF_SuppressSlowingForCorners.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set this will prevent the ped from slowing down to take corners this frame

PRF_DisablePlayerAutoVaulting.commands_ped.sch: If this flag is set on a ped it will not attempt to autovault

PRF_JayWalking.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set then the ped is jay walking and a vehicle is allowed to run him over.

PRF_UseBulletPenetration.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped will use bullet penetration code.
PRF_UseBulletPenetration.commands_ped.sch: If this flag is set on a ped it will use the bullet shoot through code

PRF_ForceAimAtHead.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Force all attackers to target the head of this ped
PRF_ForceAimAtHead.commands_ped.sch: Force all attackers to target the head of this ped

PRF_IsInStationaryScenario.PedFlagsMeta.psc: In a scenario and not moving
PRF_IsInStationaryScenario.commands_ped.sch: Inform avoidance code that this ped isn't going anywhere and should be steered around rather than waited for

PRF_PuttingOnHelmet.commands_ped.sch: When set, the ped is putting on a helmet. DONT SET THIS only query it

PRF_AllowPullingPedOntoRoute.PedFlagsMeta.psc: allows goto task to apply heading in order to pull a ped back onto their route

PRF_ApplyAnimatedVelocityWhilstAttached.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Allows attachment offsets to be updated from animated velocities

PRF_ResponseAfterScenarioPanic.PedFlagsMeta.psc: The ped is entering threat response after panic exiting a scenario.

PRF_IsNearDoor.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped is near a non-vehicle door

PRF_PanicInVehicle.commands_ped.sch: When set, the ped will play panic animations if in a vehicle

PRF_DisableDynamicCapsuleRadius.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Turn off dynamic adjustments to ped capsules

PRF_IsRappelling.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Is currently in a rappel task

PRF_SkipReactInReactAndFlee.PedFlagsMeta.psc: When this ped goes to ThreatResponse, play the flee transition but not the reaction clip if fleeing.

PRF_CannotBeTargeted.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Will prevent this ped from being a part of any other peds target list

PRF_IsFalling.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped is in pure fall state (i.e. no parachuting, landing etc included

PRF_ForceInjuryAfterStunned.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Forces this ped to the injured state after being stunned
PRF_ForceInjuryAfterStunned.commands_ped.sch: Forces this ped to the injured state after being stunned

PRF_HurtThisFrame.PedFlagsMeta.psc: The ped has entered the hurt state this frame

PRF_BlockWeaponFire.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Prevent the ped from shooting a weapon
PRF_BlockWeaponFire.commands_ped.sch: Prevent the ped from shooting a weapon

PRF_ExpandPedCapsuleFromSkeleton.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set the ped capsule radius based on skeleton
PRF_ExpandPedCapsuleFromSkeleton.commands_ped.sch: Set the ped capsule radius based on skeleton

PRF_DisableWeaponLaserSight.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Toggle the weapon laser sight off for this frame
PRF_DisableWeaponLaserSight.commands_ped.sch: Toggle the weapon laser sight off for this frame

PRF_PedExitedVehicleThisFrame.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set when ped gets set out of vehicle

PRF_SearchingForDropDown.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped is seatching for drop down

PRF_UseTighterTurnSettings.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped should use tighter turn settings in human locomotion motion task

PRF_DisableArmSolver.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Disable the arm solver this frame

PRF_TasksNeedProcessMoveSignalCalls.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set when peds require calls to ProcessMoveSignals(), for AI timeslicing to work with Move

PRF_NoCollisionMovementMode.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set when a ped is moving in an area where collisions with fixed geometry are unlikely.  The ped's physics will not be forced to activate.

PRF_IsNearLaddder.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped is near top of a ladder

PRF_IgnoredByAutoOpenDoors.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set this for a ped to be ignored by the auto opened doors when checking to see if the door should be opened.

PRF_BlockIkWeaponReactions.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped should not play Ik damager reactions while this flag is set

PRF_FirstPhysicsUpdate.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped was just created this frame

PRF_SuspendInitiatedMeleeActions.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Temporarily suspend any melee actions this frame (does not include hit reactions). Use PCF_DisableMelee to turn it off completely
PRF_SuspendInitiatedMeleeActions.commands_ped.sch: Temporarily suspend any melee actions this frame (does not include hit reactions). Use PCF_DisableMelee to turn it off completely

PRF_SuppressInAirEvent.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Prevents ped from getting the in air event the next frame
PRF_SuppressInAirEvent.commands_ped.sch: Prevents ped from getting the in air event the next frame

PRF_AllowTasksIncompatibleWithMotion.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set, ped will skip CheckTasksAreCompatibleWithMotion
PRF_AllowTasksIncompatibleWithMotion.commands_ped.sch: If set, allows ped to have tasks incompatible with its current motion

PRF_HasGunTaskWithAimingState.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped is running TASK_GUN and task's state is State_Aim

PRF_SuppressLethalMeleeActions.PedFlagsMeta.psc: This will suppress any melee action that is considered lethal (RA_IS_LETHAL, defined in action_table.meta)
PRF_SuppressLethalMeleeActions.commands_ped.sch: This will suppress any melee action that is considered lethal (RA_IS_LETHAL, defined in action_table.meta)

PRF_AmbientIdleAndBaseAnimsBlocked.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Blocks ambient idles and base animations from playing.

PRF_UseAlternativeWhenBlock.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set, ped will use alternative aiming/firing anims

PRF_ForceLowLodWaterCheck.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set, the ped will always force probe for being in water when in low LOD mode.

PRF_MakeHeadInvisible.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set, scale the head of the ped to 0.001

PRF_NoAutoRunWhenFiring.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Don't auto run when NoAutoRunWhenFiring is set.
PRF_NoAutoRunWhenFiring.commands_ped.sch: Don't auto run when NoAutoRunWhenFiring is set

PRF_PermitEventDuringScenarioExit.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ignore certain aspects (FOV checks, etc) of AffectsPedCore() on some events while the ped is playing a scenario exit.

PRF_DisableSteeringAroundVehicles.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around vehicles

PRF_DisableSteeringAroundPeds.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around peds

PRF_DisableSteeringAroundObjects.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around objects

PRF_DisableSteeringAroundNavMeshEdges.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around nav mesh edges
PRF_DisableSteeringAroundNavMeshEdges.commands_ped.sch: Don't let this ped take navmesh edges into account when performing their low-level steering/avoidance code

PRF_ForceCombatTaunt.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Forces a combat taunt for peds using the insult special ability.
PRF_ForceCombatTaunt.commands_ped.sch: If this ped has the INSULT special ability, and this flag is set, he will always use the combat taunt when the special is activated

PRF_SkipAiUpdateProcessControl.PedFlagsMeta.psc: True if we've already run this ped's AI and can skip it from within ProcessControl

PRF_OverridePhysics.PedFlagsMeta.psc: A reset flag that disables collision and gravity on the ped and drives entity positions and rotations directly, rather than going through the physics update.

PRF_WasPhysicsOverridden.PedFlagsMeta.psc: True if physics was overriden during the last update.

PRF_BlockWeaponHoldingAnims.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Block any onfoot weapon holding anims.

PRF_DisableMoveTaskHeadingAdjustments.PedFlagsMeta.psc: True if the ped's movement task should not adjust the heading of the ped.

PRF_PreventAllMeleeTakedowns.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Will temporarily prevent any takedown from being performed on this ped
PRF_PreventAllMeleeTakedowns.commands_ped.sch: Will temporarily prevent any takedown from being performed on this ped

PRF_PreventFailedMeleeTakedowns.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Will temporarily prevent any failed takedowns from being performed on this ped
PRF_PreventFailedMeleeTakedowns.commands_ped.sch: Will temporarily prevent any failed takedown from being performed on this ped

PRF_UseTighterAvoidanceSettings.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped should use tighter avoidance settings in navigation task
PRF_UseTighterAvoidanceSettings.commands_ped.sch: Will temporarily force min avoidance on this ped.  will brush other peds but avoid a bit

PRF_IsHigherPriorityClipControllingPed.PedFlagsMeta.psc: True if the active task on the main task tree is taking responsibility for the mover track

PRF_VehicleCrushingRagdoll.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set to true if a vehicle is pressing downward on the ragdoll

PRF_OnActivationUpdate.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped was just activated this frame

PRF_ForceMotionStateLeaveDesiredMBR.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set this to disable setting the desired move blendratio when forcing the motion state. Usefull for forcing a flee start, etc

PRF_DisableDropDowns.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Disable drop downs for this ped
PRF_DisableDropDowns.commands_ped.sch: Disable drop downs for this ped

PRF_InContactWithBIGFoliage.PedFlagsMeta.psc: ped is in contact with GTA_FOLIAGE_TYPE bounds that are large and the player can be hidden

PRF_DisableCellphoneAnimations.PedFlagsMeta.psc: tells taskmobile phone to Blends out move network and prevents it from blending in

PRF_TouchingOverhang.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Some part appears to be contrained downwards

PRF_TooSteepForPlayer.PedFlagsMeta.psc: We're standing on something flagged too steep for the player to stand on

PRF_BlockSecondaryAnim.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Block any secondary scripted task animations playing on this ped

PRF_IsInCombat.PedFlagsMeta.psc: This ped is running the combat task

PRF_UseHeadOrientationForPerception.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Will use the ped's head orientation for perception tests
PRF_UseHeadOrientationForPerception.commands_ped.sch: Use the ped's head orientation for perception tests

PRF_IsDoingDriveby.PedFlagsMeta.psc: This ped is running a driveby gun or projectile task

PRF_IsEnteringCover.PedFlagsMeta.psc: This ped is running a cover entry task

PRF_ForceMovementScannerCheck.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set to make CStaticMovementScanner::Scan() check for collisions as if we were moving

PRF_DisableJumpRagdollOnCollision.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If true, the player will no longer auto-ragdoll when colliding with objects, peds, etc. while jumping
PRF_DisableJumpRagdollOnCollision.commands_ped.sch: The player will no longer auto-ragdoll when colliding with objects, peds, etc. while jumping

PRF_IsBeingMeleeHomedByPlayer.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set on the target ped in melee if the player is homing towards them

PRF_ShouldLaunchBicycleThisFrame.PedFlagsMeta.psc: This ped should launch the bicycle this frame

PRF_CanDoBicycleWheelie.PedFlagsMeta.psc: This ped can do a bicycle wheelie

PRF_ForceProcessPhysicsUpdateEachSimStep.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If true, ProcessPhysics() will execute completely for each physics simulation step

PRF_DisablePedCapsuleMapCollision.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Disables collision between the ped capsule and the map (usefull in cases where the entity position is being tightly controlled outside of physics, e.g. by an animation)

PRF_DisableSeatShuffleDueToInjuredDriver.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If true, motion in vehicle task won't shuffle to the driver seat just because the driver is injured

PRF_ProcessPostMovement.PedFlagsMeta.psc: do we need to call ProcessPostMovement for tasks

PRF_ProcessPostCamera.PedFlagsMeta.psc: do we need to call ProcessPostCamera for tasks

PRF_ProcessPostPreRender.PedFlagsMeta.psc: do we need to call ProcessPostPreRender for tasks

PRF_ProcessPhysicsTasksMotion.PedFlagsMeta.psc: do we need to call process physics for motion tasks this frame

PRF_ProcessPhysicsTasksMovement.PedFlagsMeta.psc: do we need to call process physics for movement tasks this frame

PRF_DisableFriendlyGunReactAudio.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set, disables friendly responses to gunshots/being aimed at.
PRF_DisableFriendlyGunReactAudio.commands_ped.sch: If set, disables friendly responses to gunshots/being aimed at.

PRF_ForceForwardTransitionInReactAndFlee.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set, force CTaskReactAndFlee to use a forward facing flee transition

PRF_DoNotSkipNavMeshTrackerUpdate.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set we will not allow the NavMeshTracker update to be skipped this frame.

PRF_RagdollOnVehicle.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set to true when the ragdoll is lying on top of a vehicle (note- hands, feet, forearms and shins are not included in the test)

PRF_DisableNMForRiverRapids.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set, disable NM reactions to fast moving water
PRF_DisableNMForRiverRapids.commands_ped.sch: Disable NM reactions to fast moving water for this ped

PRF_IsInWrithe.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set, the ped is on the ground writhing and might start shooting from ground

PRF_PreventGoingIntoStillInVehicleState.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set, the ped will not go into the still in vehicle pose
PRF_PreventGoingIntoStillInVehicleState.commands_ped.sch: If set, the ped will not go into the still in vehicle pose

PRF_UseFastEnterExitVehicleRates.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set, the ped will get in and out of vehicles faster
PRF_UseFastEnterExitVehicleRates.commands_ped.sch: If set, the ped will get in and out of vehicles faster (same as in mp)

PRF_DisableGroundAttachment.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set, the ped won't attach to a ground physical when his physics disables (useful for cutscenes, etc)

PRF_ForceProcessPedStandingUpdateEachSim.PedFlagsMeta.psc: When set, ProcessPedStanding will get called for each physics step.

PRF_DisableFlashLight.PedFlagsMeta.psc: When set, the flash light on a Ai weapon will be turned off.
PRF_DisableFlashLight.commands_ped.sch: When set, the flash light on a Ai weapon will be turned off

PRF_DoingCombatRoll.PedFlagsMeta.psc: When set, the ped is doing a combat roll

PRF_CanAbortExitForInAirEvent.PedFlagsMeta.psc: When set, the ped can abort the exit vehicle anim to go into fall

PRF_ForceEnableFlashLightForAI.PedFlagsMeta.psc: When set, the ai ped will enable their flash light
PRF_ForceEnableFlashLightForAI.commands_ped.sch: When set, the ai ped will enable their flash light

PRF_WaitingForCompletedPathRequest.PedFlagsMeta.psc: This ped is waiting for a path request which is now complete, so their tasks must be updated this frame

PRF_EnableSteepSlopePrevention.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Pushes the ped through the same steep slope tolerances in TaskMotionBase that the player encounters

PRF_ProcessPostMovementTimeSliced.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Parallel flag to ProcessPostMovement, except this is reset in PreTask(), meaning it stays consistent across timeslicing.

PRF_OverrideHairScale.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Scales the ped's hair down to the specified value

PRF_ConsiderAsPlayerCoverThreatWithoutLO.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Considered as a threat as part of player cover search even if they can't see the player
PRF_ConsiderAsPlayerCoverThreatWithoutLO.commands_ped.sch: Considered as a threat as part of player cover search even if they can't see the player

PRF_StreamActionModeAnimsIfDisabled.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Stream action mode anims even if action mode is disabled

PRF_ForceUpdateRagdollMatrix.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped requires ragdoll matrix update next frame.

PRF_PreventGoingIntoShuntInVehicleState.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set, the ped will not go into the shunt in vehicle pose
PRF_PreventGoingIntoShuntInVehicleState.commands_ped.sch: If set, the ped will not go into the shunt in vehicle pose

PRF_DontActivateRagdollFromPlayerPedImpa.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Block ragdoll activations from animated player bumps

PRF_DontActivateRagdollFromAiRagdollImpa.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Block ragdoll activations from collisions with an ai ragdoll

PRF_DontActivateRagdollFromPlayerRagdoll.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Block ragdoll activations from collisions with a player ragdoll

PRF_DisableVisemeBodyAdditive.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set, prevents visemes from playing any additive body animations

PRF_CapsuleBeingPushedByPlayerCapsule.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set when the player capsule is pushing up against this peds capsule

PRF_UsingMoverExtraction.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set when the players capsule is getting repositioned each frame relative to an anim and origin

PRF_EnableVoiceDrivenMouthMovement.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set, turn on the voice driven mouth movement
PRF_EnableVoiceDrivenMouthMovement.commands_ped.sch: If set, turn on the voice driven mouth movement

PRF_UseTighterEnterVehicleSettings.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped should use tighter (shorter) settings for entering vehicles
PRF_UseTighterEnterVehicleSettings.commands_ped.sch: To have peds do better vehicle entries when in a group and interfered by other peds, use carefully though

PRF_InRaceMode.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set when the player is in the race mode.
PRF_InRaceMode.commands_ped.sch: Set when the player is in the races to make the player more interesting to look at.

PRF_AllowSpecialAbilityInVehicle.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Allows the player to trigger the special ability while in a vehicle
PRF_AllowSpecialAbilityInVehicle.commands_ped.sch: Allows the player to trigger the special ability while in a vehicle

PRF_DisableInVehicleActions.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Prevents ped from doing in vehicle actions such as starting engine, hotwiring, closing door etc.
PRF_DisableInVehicleActions.commands_ped.sch: Prevents ped from doing in vehicle actions like closing door, hotwiring, starting engine, putting on helmet etc

PRF_ForceInstantSteeringWheelIkBlendIn.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Forces ped to blend in steering wheel ik instantly rather than over time.
PRF_ForceInstantSteeringWheelIkBlendIn.commands_ped.sch: Forces ped to blend in steering wheel ik instantly rather than over time

PRF_IgnoreThreatEngagePlayerCoverBonus.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ignores the bonus score for selecting cover that the player can engage the enemy at
PRF_IgnoreThreatEngagePlayerCoverBonus.commands_ped.sch: Ignores the bonus score for selecting cover that the player can engage the enemy at

PRF_Block180Turns.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Blocks triggering of 180 turns in human locomotion this frame.

PRF_DontCloseVehicleDoor.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Prevents the ped from closing the vehicle door of the car they're in
PRF_DontCloseVehicleDoor.commands_ped.sch: Prevents the ped from closing the vehicle door of the car they're inside

PRF_SkipExplosionOcclusion.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Map collision will not block this ped from being hit by explosions
PRF_SkipExplosionOcclusion.commands_ped.sch: Explosions can't be blocked by map collision when damaging this ped

PRF_ProcessPhysicsTasksTimeSliced.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Parallel flag to ProcessPhysicsTasks, except this is reset in PreTask(), meaning it stays consistent across timeslicing.

PRF_MeleeStrikeAgainstNonPed.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set when the ped has performed a melee strike and hit any non ped material
PRF_MeleeStrikeAgainstNonPed.commands_ped.sch: Set when the ped has performed a melee strike and hit any non ped material

PRF_IgnoreNavigationForDoorArmIK.PedFlagsMeta.psc: We will not attempt to walk around doors when using arm IK
PRF_IgnoreNavigationForDoorArmIK.commands_ped.sch: We will not attempt to walk around doors when using arm IK

PRF_DisablePedCollisionWithPedEvent.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Disable hit reaction due to colliding with a ped
PRF_DisablePedCollisionWithPedEvent.commands_ped.sch: Disable hit reaction due to colliding with a ped

PRF_IgnoreVelocityWhenClosingVehicleDoor.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Will ignore the vehicle speed threshold and close the door anyway
PRF_IgnoreVelocityWhenClosingVehicleDoor.commands_ped.sch: Will ignore the vehicle speed threshold and close the door anyway

PRF_DontWalkRoundObjects.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Don't walk round objects that we collide with whilst moving
PRF_DontWalkRoundObjects.commands_ped.sch: Don't walk round objects that we collide with whilst moving

PRF_DisablePedEnteredMyVehicleEvents.commands_ped.sch: Disable ped entered my vehicle events

PRF_CancelLeftHandGripIk.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Call ProcessLeftHandGripIk() to cancel left hand grip IK, at the right time of the frame

PRF_ResetMovementStaticCounter.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Will keep reset the static counter when this is set

PRF_DisableInVehiclePedVariationBlocking.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Will allow ped variations to be rendered in vehicles, even if marked otherwise
PRF_DisableInVehiclePedVariationBlocking.commands_ped.sch: Will allow ped variations to be rendered in vehicles, even if marked otherwise

PRF_ReduceEffectOfVehicleRamControlLoss.PedFlagsMeta.psc: When on a mission this reset flag will slightly reduce the amount of time the player loses control of their vehicle when hit by an AI ped
PRF_ReduceEffectOfVehicleRamControlLoss.commands_ped.sch: When on a mission this reset flag will slightly reduce the amount of time the player loses control of their vehicle when hit by an AI ped

PRF_DisablePlayerMeleeFriendlyAttacks.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Another flag to disable friendly attack from the player. Set on the opponent you would like it to be disabled on.
PRF_DisablePlayerMeleeFriendlyAttacks.commands_ped.sch: Another flag to disable friendly attack from the player. Set on the opponent you would like it to be disabled on.

PRF_IsMeleeTargetUnreachable.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set when the melee target has been deemed unreachable (AI only)
PRF_IsMeleeTargetUnreachable.commands_ped.sch: Set when the melee target has been deemed unreachable (AI only)

PRF_DisableAutoForceOutWhenBlowingUpCar.commands_ped.sch: Disable automatically forcing player to exit a vehicle in a network game when blowing up vehicle

PRF_OverrideHairScaleLarger.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Scales the ped's hair up to the specified value

PRF_DisableMeleeHitReactions.PedFlagsMeta.psc: This ped will refrain from ever performing a melee hit reaction
PRF_DisableMeleeHitReactions.commands_ped.sch: This ped will refrain from ever performing a melee hit reaction

PRF_VisemeAnimsAudioBlocked.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Blocks viseme anims audio from playing

PRF_AllowHeadPropInVehicle.PedFlagsMeta.psc: This overrides PV_FLAG_NOT_IN_CAR set on any head prop and stops it from being removed when getting into the vehicle
PRF_AllowHeadPropInVehicle.commands_ped.sch: This overrides PV_FLAG_NOT_IN_CAR set on any head prop and stops it from being removed when getting into the vehicle

PRF_SetLastBoundMatricesDone.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ensure that the last bound matrices are only updated once per frame

PRF_PreserveAnimatedAngularVelocity.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Don't allow the locomotion task to adjust angular velocity coming from animation

PRF_OpenDoorArmIK.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set if the ped should enable open door arm IK
PRF_OpenDoorArmIK.commands_ped.sch: Reset version of PCF_OpenDoorArmIK, which sets if the ped should enable open door arm IK.

PRF_UseTighterTurnSettingsForScript.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Script set flag, to force use of tighter turn settings in locomotion task
PRF_UseTighterTurnSettingsForScript.commands_ped.sch: Force use of tighter turn settings in locomotion task

PRF_ForcePreCameraProcessExternallyDrive.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set if the ped should process externally driven dofs before the pre-camera ai update

PRF_LadderBlockingMovement.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped is waiting for ladder and blocking movement to prevent falling off

PRF_DisableVoiceDrivenMouthMovement.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set, turn off the voice driven mouth movement (overrides EnableVoiceDrivenMouthMovement)
PRF_DisableVoiceDrivenMouthMovement.commands_ped.sch: If set, turn off the voice driven mouth movement (overrides EnableVoiceDrivenMouthMovement)

PRF_SteerIntoSkids.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set, steer into skids while driving
PRF_SteerIntoSkids.commands_ped.sch: If set, steer into skids while driving

PRF_AllowOpenDoorIkBeforeFullMovement.PedFlagsMeta.psc: When set, code will ignore the logic that requires the ped to be in CTaskHumanLocomotion::State_Moving
PRF_AllowOpenDoorIkBeforeFullMovement.commands_ped.sch: When set, code will ignore the logic that requires the ped to be in CTaskHumanLocomotion::State_Moving

PRF_AllowHomingMissileLockOnInVehicle.PedFlagsMeta.psc: When set, code will bypass rel settings and allow a homing lock on to this ped when they are in a vehicle
PRF_AllowHomingMissileLockOnInVehicle.commands_ped.sch: When set, code will bypass rel settings and allow a homing lock on to this ped when they are in a vehicle

PRF_DontChangeHorseMbr.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Similar to PRF_DontChangeMbrInSimpleMoveDoNothing, but for horses.

PRF_DisableMaterialCollisionDamage.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Don't be damaged by touching dangerous material (e.g. electic generator)
PRF_DisableMaterialCollisionDamage.commands_ped.sch: Don't be damaged by touching dangerous material (e.g. electic generator)

PRF_DisableMPFriendlyLockon.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Don't target friendly players in MP
PRF_DisableMPFriendlyLockon.commands_ped.sch: Don't target friendly players in MP

PRF_DisableMPFriendlyLethalMeleeActions.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Don't melee kill friendly players in MP
PRF_DisableMPFriendlyLethalMeleeActions.commands_ped.sch: Don't melee kill friendly players in MP

PRF_IfLeaderStopsSeekCover.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If our leader stops, try and seek cover if we can
PRF_IfLeaderStopsSeekCover.commands_ped.sch: If our leader stops, try and seek cover if we can

PRF_ProcessPostPreRenderAfterAttachments.PedFlagsMeta.psc: do we need to call PRF_ProcessPostPreRenderAfterAttachments for tasks

PRF_IsUsingJetpack.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Is ped currently using jetpack. e.g. in air

PRF_IsClosingVehicleDoor.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped is closing a vehicle door
PRF_IsClosingVehicleDoor.commands_ped.sch: Ped is closing a vehicle door

PRF_DisableIdleExtraHeadingChange.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Disable lerping the ped towards the desired heading in the locomotion idle

PRF_OnlySelectVehicleWeapons.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Only allows vehicle weapons to be selected in CPedWeaponSelector::SelectWeapon

PRF_IsWarpingIntoVehicleMP.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set in CTaskEnterVehicle::SetPedInSeat_OnEnter if ped is warping into a vehicle in multiplayer

PRF_RemoveHelmet.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Forces a ped to remove its helmet.

PRF_IsRemovingHelmet.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Returns true if ped is removing its helmet.

PRF_NeverRagdoll.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Disable all attempts by this ped to ragdoll.

PRF_DisableWallHitAnimation.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Disable stuck wall hit animation for the ped this frame.
PRF_DisableWallHitAnimation.commands_ped.sch: Disable stuck wall hit animation for the ped this frame

PRF_PlayAgitatedAnimsInVehicle.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Play agitated anims in vehicle - overrides normal sit idle
PRF_PlayAgitatedAnimsInVehicle.commands_ped.sch: When set, the ped will play panic animations if in a vehicle

PRF_IsSeatShuffling.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Returns true if ped is shuffling seat.

PRF_IsThrowingProjectileWhileAiming.PedFlagsMeta.psc: True if we are running TASK_AIM_AND_THROW_PROJECTILE as a subtask of TASK_AIM_GUN_ON_FOOT.

PRF_AllowControlRadioInAnySeatInMP.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Allows ped in any seat to control radio in multiplayer.
PRF_AllowControlRadioInAnySeatInMP.commands_ped.sch: Allows ped in any seat to control the radio (in MP only)

PRF_DisableSpycarTransformation.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Blocks ped from manually transforming spycar to/from car/sub modes.
PRF_DisableSpycarTransformation.commands_ped.sch: Blocks ped from manually transforming spycar to/from car/sub modes

PRF_BlockQuadLocomotionIdleTurns.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Prevent CTaskQuadLocomotion from blending in idle turns, regardless of desired/currenting heading differential.

PRF_BlockHeadbobbingToRadio.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Blocks ped from headbobbing to radio music in vehicles.
PRF_BlockHeadbobbingToRadio.commands_ped.sch: Blocks ped from headbobbing to radio music in vehicles

PRF_PlayFPSIdleFidgets.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Allows us to load and play idle fidgets in TaskMotionAiming

PRF_ForceExtraLongBlendInForPedSkipIdleC.PedFlagsMeta.psc: When putting a ped directly into cover, the ped will blend in the new cover anims slowly to prevent a pose pop
PRF_ForceExtraLongBlendInForPedSkipIdleC.commands_ped.sch: When putting a ped directly into cover, the ped will blend in the new cover anims slowly to prevent a pose pop, see B*1788366

PRF_BlendingOutFPSIdleFidgets.PedFlagsMeta.psc: True if FPS idle fidgets are blending out

PRF_FPSSwimUseSwimMotionTask.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set to true when we are pressing forward on the left stick in FPS mode so we switch from Aiming to Swimmimg/Diving motion tasks

PRF_FPSSwimUseAimingMotionTask.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set to true when we are strafing in water in FPS mode so we use the motion aiming task

PRF_FiringWeaponWhenReady.PedFlagsMeta.psc: set when ped has decided to fire weapon when ready, used in FPS mode

PRF_IsBlindFiring.PedFlagsMeta.psc: True if the blind fire task is running

PRF_IsPeekingFromCover.PedFlagsMeta.psc: True if the ped is peeking in cover

PRF_TaskSkipProcessPreComputeImpacts.PedFlagsMeta.psc: True to bail out of ProcessPreComputeImpacts

PRF_DisableAssistedAimLockon.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Don't ever try to lock on to this ped with cinematic aim
PRF_DisableAssistedAimLockon.commands_ped.sch: Don't ever try to lock on to this ped with cinematic aim

PRF_FPSAllowAimIKForThrownProjectile.PedFlagsMeta.psc: To control enabling of FPS aim IK while using a projectile until it is ready

PRF_ForcePreCameraAiAnimUpdateIfFirstPer.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Force a pre camera ai and animation update if the ped is the first person camera target during the pre camera update

PRF_NeverDieFromCapsuleRagdollSettings.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Negate the capsule's preference for ragdoll triggering death on this ped.

PRF_InContactWithDeepSurface.PedFlagsMeta.psc: ped is in contact with GTA_DEEP_SURFACE_TYPE bounds

PRF_IncludePedReferenceVelocityWhenFirin.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Add on the ped's velocity to the projectile's initial velocity.

PRF_InstantBlendToAimNoSettle.commands_ped.sch: If true it avoids playing the settle anim when aiming

PRF_ForcePreCameraAnimUpdate.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Force a pre camera animation update if the ped is the first person camera target during the pre camera update

PRF_DisableHelmetCullFPS.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Disables PV_FLAG_HIDE_IN_FIRST_PERSON from culling the prop in CPedPropsMgr::RenderPropsInternal

PRF_ForceScriptedCameraLowCoverAngleWhen.commands_ped.sch: For first person mode, when the player enters low cover, will orientate camera to face left or right rather than into cover

PRF_DisableFPSArmIK.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Disables FPS arm IK in CTaskPlayerOnFoot::IsStateValidForFPSIK

PRF_DisableRightArmIKInCoverOutroFPS.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Turn off right arm IK during cover outros in FPS mode when set

PRF_WeaponBlockedInFPSMode.PedFlagsMeta.psc: True if running CTaskWeaponBlocked in FPS mode

PRF_WasFPSJumpingWithProjectile.PedFlagsMeta.psc: ped was jumping on foot with projectile in hand

PRF_WaypointPlaybackSlowMoreForCorners.PedFlagsMeta.psc: slow for corners more aggressively for waypoint playback
PRF_WaypointPlaybackSlowMoreForCorners.commands_ped.sch: Allows peds following waypoint recordings to slow down more for corners. (Achieves same effect as the EWAYPOINT_SUPPRESS_EXACTSTOP flag, which is passed into TASK_FOLLOW_WAYPOINT_RECORDING).

PRF_UseBulletPenetrationForGlass.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped will use bullet penetration code when glass material is hit.
PRF_UseBulletPenetrationForGlass.commands_ped.sch: Ped will use bullet penetration code when glass material is hit.

PRF_CanBePinnedByFriendlyBullets.PedFlagsMeta.psc: If set on a ped then they are allowed to be pinned by bullets from friendly peds
PRF_CanBePinnedByFriendlyBullets.commands_ped.sch: If set on a ped then they are allowed to be pinned by bullets from friendly peds

PRF_DisableLeftArmIKInCoverOutroFPS.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Turn off left arm IK during cover outros in FPS mode when set

PRF_DisableSpikeStripRoadBlocks.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Blocks road blocks with spike strips from spawning
PRF_DisableSpikeStripRoadBlocks.commands_ped.sch: Blocks road blocks with spike strips from spawning

PRF_PutDownHelmetFX.PedFlagsMeta.psc: trigger the put down helmet fx

PRF_IsLowerPriorityMeleeTarget.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Peds marked with this flag will only be able to be hit by the player if the player explicitly presses the melee button
PRF_IsLowerPriorityMeleeTarget.commands_ped.sch: Peds marked with this flag will only be able to be hit by the player if the player explicitly presses the melee button

PRF_ForceScanForEventsThisFrame.commands_ped.sch: Disable timeslicing of event scanning this frame (see url:bugstar:2100836 for an example situation where this is useful)

PRF_StartProjectileTaskWithPrimingDisabl.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set this flag to disable priming when the projectile task starts up until the attack trigger is released and pressed again

PRF_CheckFPSSwitchInCameraUpdate.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Set if we want to perform a second AI/anim update when switching between first person/third person

PRF_ForceAutoEquipHelmetsInAicraft.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Force ped to auto-equip a helmet om entering aircraft. Overrides PCF_DisableAutoEquipHelmetsInAicraft (set in the interaction menu)
PRF_ForceAutoEquipHelmetsInAicraft.commands_ped.sch: Forces ped to auto-equip a helmet when entering an aircraft. Overrides PCF_DisableAutoEquipHelmetsInAicraft which is set in the interaction menu.

PRF_BlockRemotePlayerRecording.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Flag used by replay editor to disable recording specified remote players (for url:bugstar:2218297).
PRF_BlockRemotePlayerRecording.commands_ped.sch: Flag used by replay editor to disable recording specified remote players (for url:bugstar:2218297).

PRF_UseFirstPersonVehicleAnimsIfFPSCamNo.PedFlagsMeta.psc: allow FPS vehicle anims even if FPS camera isn't dominant
PRF_UseFirstPersonVehicleAnimsIfFPSCamNo.commands_ped.sch: allow FPS vehicle anims even if FPS camera isn't dominant

PRF_ForceIntoStandPoseOnJetski.PedFlagsMeta.psc: puts the ped in a standing pose on the jetski
PRF_ForceIntoStandPoseOnJetski.commands_ped.sch: allow FPS vehicle anims even if FPS camera isn't dominant

PRF_InAirDefenceSphere.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Ped is located inside an air defence sphere.

PRF_SuppressTakedownMeleeActions.PedFlagsMeta.psc: This will suppress all takedown melee actions (RA_IS_TAKEDOWN or RA_IS_STEALTH_KILL, defined in action_table.meta)
PRF_SuppressTakedownMeleeActions.commands_ped.sch: This will suppress all takedown melee actions (RA_IS_TAKEDOWN or RA_IS_STEALTH_KILL, defined in action_table.meta)

PRF_InvertLookAroundControls.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Inverts lookaround controls (right stick / mouse) for this player, for this frame.
PRF_InvertLookAroundControls.commands_ped.sch: Inverts lookaround controls (right stick / mouse) for this player

PRF_IgnoreCombatManager.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Allows attacking ped to engage another entity without waiting for its turn (if there's multiple attackers).
PRF_IgnoreCombatManager.commands_ped.sch: Allows attacking ped to engage another entity without waiting for its turn (if there's multiple attackers)

PRF_UseBlendedCamerasOnUpdateFpsCameraRe.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Check if there is an active camera blending and use the blended camera frame when compute the FPS camera relative matrix.
PRF_UseBlendedCamerasOnUpdateFpsCameraRe.commands_ped.sch: Check if there is an active camera blending and use the blended camera frame when compute the FPS camera relative matrix.

PRF_ForceMeleeCounter.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Forces the ped to perform a dodge and a counter move if it's attacked.
PRF_ForceMeleeCounter.commands_ped.sch: Forces the ped to perform a dodge and a counter move if it's attacked.

PRF_WasHitByVehicleMelee.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Indicates that ped was hit by vehicle melee attack.

PRF_SuppressNavmeshForEnterVehicleTask.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Dont allow ped to use navmesh when navigating in TaskEnterVehicle
PRF_SuppressNavmeshForEnterVehicleTask.commands_ped.sch: Suppress navmesh navigation in TaskEnterVehicle. Will use gotopoint or bail if cant use that

PRF_DisablePlayerCombatRoll.commands_ped.sch: Prevents the player from performing a combat roll.

PRF_IgnoreDetachSafePositionCheck.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Will ignore safe position check on detaching the ped
PRF_IgnoreDetachSafePositionCheck.commands_ped.sch: Will ignore safe position check on detaching the ped

PRF_DisableEasyLadderConditions.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Prevents the more forgiving MP ladder detection settings from being used, and forces SP settings.
PRF_DisableEasyLadderConditions.commands_ped.sch: Prevents the more forgiving MP ladder detection settings from being used, and forces SP settings.

PRF_PlayerIgnoresScenarioSpawnRestrictio.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Makes local player ignore certain scenario spawn restrictions on scenarios that respect this flag
PRF_PlayerIgnoresScenarioSpawnRestrictio.commands_ped.sch: Makes local player ignore certain scenario spawn restrictions on scenarios that respect this flag

PRF_UsingDrone.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Indicates player is using Drone from Battle DLC
PRF_UsingDrone.commands_ped.sch: Indicates player is using Drone from Battle DLC

PRF_ForceWantedLevelWhenKilled.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Will force the player that killed this ped to get wanted level, even if he wouldnt otherwise

PRF_UseScriptedWeaponFirePosition.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Will use scripted firing position on the clones of this ped on other machines
PRF_UseScriptedWeaponFirePosition.commands_ped.sch: Will use scripted firing position on the clones of this ped on other machines

PRF_EnableCollisionOnNetworkCloneWhenFix.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Enable collision on player ped network clones when physics is fixed

PRF_UseExtendedRagdollCollisionCalculato.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Use extended logic for determining damage instigator for ragdoll collisions
PRF_UseExtendedRagdollCollisionCalculato.commands_ped.sch: Use extended logic for determining damage instigator for ragdoll collisions

PRF_PreventLockonToFriendlyPlayers.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Prevent the player locking on to friendly players
PRF_PreventLockonToFriendlyPlayers.commands_ped.sch: Prevent the player locking on to friendly players

PRF_OnlyAbortScriptedAnimOnMovementByInp.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Modifies AF_ABORT_ON_PED_MOVEMENT to only trigger an abort when movement would be caused by player input
PRF_OnlyAbortScriptedAnimOnMovementByInp.commands_ped.sch: Modifies AF_ABORT_ON_PED_MOVEMENT to only trigger an abort when movement would be caused by player input

PRF_PreventAllStealthKills.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Prevents stealth take downs from being preformed on a ped
PRF_PreventAllStealthKills.commands_ped.sch: Prevents stealth take downs from being preformed on a ped

PRF_BlockFallTaskFromExplosionDamage.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Prevent peds from entering a fall task if affected by explosion damage
PRF_BlockFallTaskFromExplosionDamage.commands_ped.sch: Prevent peds from entering a fall task if affected by explosion damage

PRF_AllowPedRearEntry.PedFlagsMeta.psc: Mimics the behaviour like with boss peds by holding the button for entering the rear seats
PRF_AllowPedRearEntry.commands_ped.sch: Mimics the behaviour of boss peds by holding the button for entering the rear seats

PRF_DisableSecondaryAnimationTasks.commands_ped.sch: Disable upper body animtion tasks such as shove ped and open door anims

PRF_SearchForClosestDoor.commands_ped.sch: Will check for the closest door in proximity and store it off

PRF_UseKinematicPhysics.commands_ped.sch: Enables kinematic physics mode on this ped. This stops other physical objects from pushing the ped around, and causes the ped to push any physical objects out of its way when it moves into them.

PRF_ClearLockonTarget.commands_ped.sch: Clear the players lockon target next frame

PRF_DisableSeeThroughChecksWhenTargeting.commands_ped.sch: Any targeting LoS checks will fail if any materials with 'see through' materials found.

PRF_CannotBeTargetedByAI.commands_ped.sch: When set, this ped cannot be added to the targeting list of AI peds, will be removed if already in the list and is thought of as not able to be attacked

PRF_InstantBlendToAim.commands_ped.sch: Blend straight into an aim instantly, if starting a gun task this frame

PRF_MakeHeadInvisble.commands_ped.sch: If set, scale the head of the ped to 0.001

PRF_DisableTakeOffParachutePack.commands_ped.sch: Disable taking off the parachute pack

PRF_IgnoreCombatTaunts.commands_ped.sch: This ped will ignore combat taunts

PRF_DisableTakeOffScubaGear.commands_ped.sch: Disable taking off the scuba gear

PRF_KeepParachutePackOnAfterTeleport.commands_ped.sch: Keep the parachute pack on after a teleport

PRF_DontRaiseFistsWhenLockedOn.commands_ped.sch: Whether or not you want the player ped to use the new front melee logic in TODO #981120

PRF_PreferMeleeBodyIkHitReaction.commands_ped.sch: This will prefer all melee hit reactions to use body ik hit reactions if ragdoll is not selected

PRF_OnlyAllowLeftArmDoorIk.commands_ped.sch: When set along side open door ik, will only use the left hand

PRF_OnlyAllowRightArmDoorIk.commands_ped.sch: When set along side open door ik, will only use the left hand

PRF_EnablePressAndReleaseDives.commands_ped.sch: Player has to press and hold dive button to dive in water

PRF_OnlyExitVehicleOnButtonRelease.commands_ped.sch: Only allows player to exit vehicle when button is released rather than pressed or held

PRF_BlockCustomAIEntryAnims.commands_ped.sch: Disables ped from using custom ai cover entry animations

PRF_IgnoreVehicleEntryCollisionTests.commands_ped.sch: Ignore the vehicle entry collision tests for this ped

PRF_DisableHighHeels.commands_ped.sch: Force the high heels DOF to be 0

PRF_DontUseSprintEnergy.commands_ped.sch: Player does not get tired when sprinting

PRF_NoCollisionDamageFromOtherPeds.commands_ped.sch: Any ped this is set on won't register damage from collisions against other peds.

PRF_DontSuppressUseNavMeshToNavigateToVe.commands_ped.sch: For thing that inherit from boats only

PRF_DisableShallowWaterBikeJumpOutThisFr.commands_ped.sch: Prevents the ped from jumping out of the vehicle in shallow water if the bike is submerged
